# SQL Clients GUI


## Sqlite

We will use dbeaver for sqlite part of our course.
Dbeaver also supports other databases like oracle and sql server.

- [Dbeaver](https://dbeaver.io)

Different connections to databases could be seen in the right side of the screenshot of the DBeaver screen below.

![Note](images/DBeaver-screen.png){width=90%}

There are a lot of other GUI tools for sqlite see some examples below:

- [DB Browser for SQLite](https://sqlitebrowser.org)

- [SQLite Studio](https://sqlitestudio.pl)
